Tweet Posh Party Box $40 for $100 towards Your Party Box at PoshPartyBox.com ADVERTISEMENT More from Laguna Niguel
Laguna Niguel private school gets permission to build Youth orchestra presents music camp Caller says mother hit on head with bottle ADVERTISEMENT
By PETER SCHELDEN / THE ORANGE COUNTY REGISTER
If you act fast, you might get one of the 6,000 free chicken sandwiches being given away Friday at the new Chick-Fil-A fast food restaurant in Laguna Niguel at 28201 Crown Valley Pkwy.
People who drive up will be handed a sandwich, said publicist Anne Lerner. Chick-Fil-A will open a new restaurant in Laguna Niguel June 3. As part of the opening, 100 diners will win 52 free combo meal certificates. JENNA DEMATTIA MASTERS, THE ORANGE COUNTY REGISTER, ADVERTISEMENT The restaurant will have its grand opening on June 3. Those who wait in line starting at 6 a.m. June 2 will have a chance to win 52 free meal certificates from the restaurant in celebration of the opening.
Contact the writer: pschelden@ocregister.com or 949-492-5128
More from Laguna Niguel»
